content.question: A certain statistic <math alttext="b hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math> is being used to estimate a population parameter <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. The expected value of <math alttext="b hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math> is equal to <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. What property does <math alttext="b hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math> exhibit?

choices.label: The sampling distribution of <math alttext="b hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math> is normal.
The sampling distribution of <math alttext="b hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math> is binomial.
The sampling distribution of <math alttext="b hat" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>b</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>^</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></mstyle></math> is uniform.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Interpret statistical calculations and findings to assign meaning or assess a claim.
